attributes.action: Ban HGV Lorries over 7.5T from the roads between 0800 hrs to 2000hrs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would help the general state of our roads regarding congestion and remove them from the roads when children are going and coming back from school therefore increasing safty

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
